title: Why Crypto Traders Are Preferring This Viral Altcoin To Solana and XRP For Gains In 2025
body: As the crypto market shifts from hype-driven tokens to real-world solutions, traders are zeroing in on one standout altcoin poised for exponential growth. While giants like Solana and XRP battle regulatory uncertainty and market saturation, a lesser-known project, Remittix is quickly gaining traction. Offering instant crypto-to-fiat transfers and targeting a trillion-dollar remittance market, Remittix is drawing serious investor attention. Could this viral PayFi token be the breakout star of 2025? Many traders think so. Institutional Interest Rises as Solana Joins Bitcoin and Ethereum in ETF Listings Solana continues to make headlines with fresh momentum, currently trading at $126.36 with a 24-hour volume of $2.13 billion and a market cap of $64.47 billion. While the Solana price has inched down about 2.4% in the past day, traders are closely watching what could be a breakout moment. The buzz centers on the launch of two Solana ETFs in the U.S. , a move that could elevate SOL‚Äôs standing among institutional investors. Volatility Shares LLC is preparing to release both a standard and leveraged Solana ETF‚ÄîSOLZ and SOLT, respectively. These funds will track Solana futures, offering traditional investors exposure to SOL without direct ownership. With expense ratios of 0.95% and 1.85%, the ETFs position Solana alongside Bitcoin and Ethereum as ETF-recognized digital assets. This could fuel long-term adoption and bring in significant new capital. Still, despite the bullish backdrop, some traders are looking elsewhere for steeper returns. The interest is shifting toward altcoins that are still early in their cycle‚Äîassets with low caps but big real-world relevance. XRP Gains Momentum After SEC Case Closure XRP has also been making headlines again , not just for its price swings but for the strong rebound in sentiment following the conclusion of its long-standing legal battle with the SEC . With the case now officially closed, confidence is returning to the XRP ecosystem. Analysts point to a head-and-shoulders pattern forming on higher time frames, often seen as a signal of consolidation before a bigger move. At the time of writing, XRP trades near $2.38 and appears to be holding steady at this critical level. Another catalyst for XRP‚Äôs renewed momentum is its inclusion in the U.S. Digital Asset Reserve. For many investors, this shows institutional trust in Ripple, especially as financial markets continue to adopt tokenized payments and blockchain-powered settlements. The door now opens wider for developments like spot ETFs and stablecoin integration, giving XRP more utility and reach than ever before. However, this has not been enough to deter investors from seeking maximum gains from projects like RTX. Remittix Steals Attention Away From Crypto Heavyweights Solana and XRP While Solana and XRP continue to dominate headlines, a quieter contender is catching the attention of seasoned crypto traders‚Äî Remittix (RTX) . Unlike other projects chasing hype, Remittix has locked in on solving a very real problem: the high cost and frustrating delays of cross-border payments. With its utility-focused approach, this ERC-20 token is bridging traditional finance and blockchain by allowing users to convert crypto into fiat instantly, all while maintaining privacy and full control over their funds. What makes Remittix stand out is its focus on accessibility. In regions where banks are scarce or unreliable, Remittix steps in to offer users a way to receive crypto, convert it at local points, and use it as cash for everyday needs. The platform‚Äôs low transaction costs and real-time transfers make it a game-changer, especially for unbanked populations around the world. It‚Äôs more than a token‚Äîit‚Äôs a financial access point for millions. With over 521 million tokens sold and $14 million raised during its ICO, Remittix is proving that investor confidence is more than just speculation. Its current price of $0.0734 signals an attractive entry point for those seeking value with upside. And with locked liquidity for three years and smart contract audits already complete, Remittix shows that it‚Äôs just as serious about long-term stability as it is about innovation. Remittix Attracts Capital as Investors Seek Real Value While Solana price benefits from speed and XRP from institutional traction, Remittix is going after a massive $190 trillion remittance market‚Äîuntapped by most crypto projects. Its PayFi system delivers seamless conversions and bypasses traditional banking limitations, giving it a rare edge in functionality. In a market of tokens chasing hype, Remittix is delivering something crypto desperately needs: usability with impact. For traders eyeing 2025 gains, that‚Äôs a formula too compelling to ignore. title: Can Ethereum (ETH) charge toward $3000 this week amid whale activity spike?
body: With a rise in whale activity inspiring investor hope, Ethereum (ETH) is about to undergo a notable price breakthrough. As the cryptocurrency market shows more instability, ETH is looking at the crucial $3,000 milestone as its next main opposition. Will the biggest Ethereum investors maintain the upward momentum, or will a market drop cause a reversal of its increasing trend? Can Ethereum break $3,000 this week? Whales, big investors with substantial ETH balances, have mixed signals about Ethereum‚Äôs recent price fluctuation. Recently, 13 fresh super whales with more than 10,000 ETH have entered the market. This flood of institutional investors shows ongoing interest in Ethereum, thereby supporting its dominance in the crypto market. Simultaneously, some whales have been unloading their stocks, leaving short-term price action unpredictable. Ethereum‚Äôs constant transaction volume and rising whale accumulation point to robust underlying demand, which may lay the groundwork for a long-running climb. Ethereum rules the decentralized finance (DeFi) market despite its price swings. Currently the network is ranked as the biggest DeFi ecosystem worldwide, with a total value locked (TVL) of around $51.4 billion. Moreover, Ethereum‚Äôs stablecoin market value exceeds $272 billion, underscoring its fundamental pillar status in the crypto economy. Increased acceptance of Ethereum‚Äôs Layer 2 scaling solutions‚ÄîArbitrum and Optimism‚Äîhelps to lower transaction costs and enhance network efficiency. These events support ETH‚Äôs long-term positive prognosis even if short-term resistance levels still have influence. Market analysts differ on Ethereum‚Äôs capacity to surpass $3,000 in the coming days. Some suggest that ETH might spike toward $3,200, creating fresh support before moving more significantly toward $3,870 to $4,000. Others warn that failing to remove opposition of around $3,000 could cause a retest with less support of around $2,750. The Federal Reserve‚Äôs monetary policy fundamentally determines Ethereum‚Äôs price path. If the Fed adopts quantitative easing, liquid injections may propel ETH higher. Conversely, stricter monetary policy might restrict upward potential and postpone Ethereum‚Äôs next big surge. Rexas Finance (RXS): the rising alternative While Ethereum looks at the $3,000 breakout, Rexas Finance (RXS) is becoming a high-growth substitute, especially in the real estate market. Using blockchain technology, RXS allows fractional real estate ownership, opening retail investors access to property investment opportunities. With the global real estate market valued at $379.7 trillion, Rexas Finance removes conventional entrance restrictions so users may easily buy, sell, and trade tokenized real estate assets. Both crypto and institutional investors looking for exposure to blockchain-powered real estate investment find this invention appealing. Early investors in Rexas Finance (RXS) enjoyed an outstanding 6.67x ROI. Driven by growing usage and the platform‚Äôs real-world asset tokenizing approach, this increase indicates great market trust. Rexas Finance is in its last presale stage, with 90.83% of the tokens sold. As demand rises, the remaining supply is rapidly depleting. At a presale price of $0.20, RXS represents an attractive opportunity before its formal exchange listing, where analysts predict a 10x to 25x price increase. To heighten the buzz, the Rexas Finance team formally revealed that the much-awaited RXS coin would start trading on June 19, 2025. Investors and fans are excitedly counting down the days before RXS opens with a $0.25 listing price based on this confirmed launch date. Rexas Finance started a $1 million campaign for community involvement. This program gives early adopters an interesting chance to acquire significant ownership before the platform‚Äôs formal release by rewarding 20 lucky winners with $50,000 worth of RXS tokens apiece. Beyond real estate tokenization, the Rexas ecosystem comprises a strong DeFi infrastructure, AI-driven NFT manufacturing, and simple token creation tools. This all-encompassing strategy confirms RXS‚Äôs role as a game-changing tool with outstanding long-term promise. Conclusion Although Ethereum still rules the blockchain scene, emerging initiatives like Rexas Finance are showing their worth by tackling actual issues. Both assets provide intriguing investment prospects in 2025 as Ethereum‚Äôs price recovers around $3,000 and RXS gains traction in blockchain-powered real estate. Whether ETH breaks its resistance this week or experiences a brief retreat, its long-term direction remains positive. Meanwhile, RXS is rapidly becoming a top competitor in the crypto market, giving investors access to a high-growth industry with enormous upside. title: Crypto Trader Provides Detailed Plan on How Bitcoin Price Will Revisit $91K
body: In a recent Telegram post RektProof, a crypto trader, outlined his plan on Bitcoin price. In which, he explains the price could be forming a key demand zone that could be key in pushing BTC to $91K, a level last seen two weeks ago. As of Saturday, March 22, 2025, BTC‚Äôs value is up 0.22% today and stuck in the $84K to $85K region. Ethereum (ETH) is up 1.14% and is close to revisiting the $2,000 psychological level. Bitcoin Price Will Reach $91K if This Happens, Says Crypto Trader RektProof Rektproof, one of the most renowned crypto traders, posted his analysis on Bitcoin price. The recent telegram post shows BTC price hovering inside the $84K to $81.1K daily demand zone. Inside this daily demand, RektProof outlines a potential four-hour demand zone, stretching from $84.3K to $83.1K which could be the support zone that propels the crypto market higher. BTC/USDT 4-hour chart If the crypto trader‚Äôs outlook comes true, i.e., if Bitcoin price creates the four-hour demand zone, it could bounce 3.74% to the most recent swing high at $87,500, formed on March 19. Beyond this first target, the price could extend to $91,279, which is the key high-volume node formed in early March. In one of his early posts , crypto trader RektProof also notes $95K as the next key resistance level to watch, should the bullish momentum continue. Will Bitcoin Bounce Here? According to data from CoinGlass, there is a possibility of a potential dip before Bitcoin price can move higher. The $83.1K level contains nearly $1M worth of liquidity, which might be tapped before a sustained move to the upside. A high dense liquidity pool exists around $84K to $85K, which coincides with the levels noted by crypto trader RektProof. Other liquidity levels include $86.8K, $88K and $90K. BTC Liquidity Heatmap Long-term BTC Holders at Breakeven The 365-day MVRV ratio (Market Value to Realized Value) has hit zero level, suggesting that investors who purchased BTC in the past year are at breakeven. The last time this metric tagged this level was in August 2024, which was followed by more than 50% rally in Bitcoin price in the next five months. If history repeats, Bitcoin price prediction is on the verge of a bullish breakout. BTC 365-day MVRV RektProof‚Äôs analysis suggests that Bitcoin price could revisit $91K if it forms a four-hour demand zone, with potential targets at $87,500, $91,279, and $95K, supported by the 365-day MVRV ratio hitting zero The post Crypto Trader Provides Detailed Plan on How Bitcoin Price Will Revisit $91K appeared first on CoinGape .

title: Bitcoin Price Prediction for Today: Will BTC Price Reach $84,800?
body: The post Bitcoin Price Prediction for Today: Will BTC Price Reach $84,800? appeared first on Coinpedia Fintech News The Bitcoin price and the entire market were expected to be highly volatile during the last trading day. It was not because of the option‚Äôs expiry but because the traders were uncertain of its adverse impact that made them prepare for bullish and bearish scenarios. However, BTC prices failed to reach either of the marked levels and remained constrained within a narrow range. Although this offers short-term relief from the volatility, from a wider perspective, such sluggish Bitcoin behaviour could be worrisome! After facing rejection from $86,800, the traders appear to have become pessimistic, which mirrors the volume that has slashed below $20 billion. Whenever the volume plunges to such lows, the prices usually remain lethargic by maintaining a range-bound consolidation. Now the question arises: will the Bitcoin price go up or crash in 2025? Before analyzing the price movements, let‚Äôs have a look at the factors impacting the upcoming BTC price action in 2025. Whale Accumulation at its Peak The recent price action of Bitcoin suggests a notable drop in the on-chain readings and also future data as well. Meanwhile, the whale accumulation remains at its peak, which suggests a substantial rise in the institutional investors. The data from the Glassnode suggests the BTC wallets holding over 1000 BTC have increased from 2040 to 2079 and are currently stabilized to 2077. Monitoring whale activity is extremely crucial, as they can influence the BTC price. The growing number of whales displays the growing confidence among the investors. New Investors Are On the Rise Apart from whales, first-time investors or new investors are also on the rise. The February 23 plunge that dragged the levels from $96,500 to $82,300 attracted huge investors to the platform. The investors appear to have utilized the buy-the-dip opportunity as it happened during the FTX collapse. The above data from Cryptoquant suggests that these new investors have accumulated nearly 172,705 BTC since then. This can be considered one of the bullish signals, as it also denotes a rise in the investor‚Äôs confidence in the token. These on-chain readings hint towards a significant rise in the confidence of whales and new investors, which is important to maintain the volatility within the markets. Besides, huge transfers of cl o se to 3000 BTC between unknown wallets may also shake up the volatility in the coming weekend, compelling the traders to believe a huge whale movement is underway. if (checkbox.checked) { selectedSubscriptions.push(checkbox.id); storeCheckedId.push(dataId); } else { uniqueSubscribedIds.delete(dataId); // Remove unchecked data-id } }); // Update listOfSubscribed with unique values listOfSubscribed = Array.from(uniqueSubscribedIds); Welcome to our community! `; let selectedSubscriptionsArray = selectedSubscriptionsString.split(','); let subscribedCategories = selectedSubscriptionsArray.map(subscription => subscription.split('_')[0]); let subscribedCategoriesString = subscribedCategories.join(', '); subscribedmodal.innerHTML = subscribedPopupModal; if (document.getElementById('selectidname')) { document.getElementById('selectidname').textContent = subscribedCategoriesString; } document.querySelector('#subscribe-modal-design .modal').style.display = 'none'; subscribedmodal.style.display = 'block'; subscribedmodal.classList.remove('hide'); subscribedmodal.classList.add('show'); var modal = document.querySelector('#' + modalId); // Using querySelector to find the modal if (modal) { modal.classList.add('hide'); modal.classList.remove('show'); setTimeout(function() { modal.style.display = 'none'; }, 500); } else { console.warn('Modal not found:', modalId); } } function closeunsubscribemodal() { var unsubscribemodal = document.querySelector('.unsubscribed-popup-modal .modal'); if (unsubscribemodal) { unsubscribemodal.classList.add('hide'); unsubscribemodal.classList.remove('show'); } setTimeout(function() { unsubscribemodal.style.display = 'none'; }, 500); } function closesubscribemodal() { var subscribedmodal = document.querySelector('.subscribed-popup-modal .modal'); setTimeout(function() { subscribedmodal.style.display = 'none'; }, 500); if (subscribedmodal) { subscribedmodal.classList.add('hide'); subscribedmodal.classList.remove('show'); } } function withoutLoginClicked(withoutlogin_id) { localStorage.setItem('subscribe_without_Login', 'true'); localStorage.setItem('subscribe_clicked_id', withoutlogin_id); } document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', function() { const subscribewithoutData = localStorage.getItem('subscribe_without_Login'); if (parts.length == 2) return parts.pop().split(";").shift(); } // Get user token from cookies const userToken = getCookie('user_token'); if (subscribewithoutData === 'true' && userToken) { // Call the modal function with the category ID subscribed_popupmodal(subscribe_clicked_cat_id); // Remove the flag and category ID from localStorage localStorage.removeItem('subscribe_without_Login'); localStorage.removeItem('subscribe_clicked_id'); } }); /************************** update susbcriber content **************************** */ function initializeSubscriptionButton() { var initialListItems = document.querySelectorAll('.subscription-options input[type="checkbox"]'); initialListItems.forEach(function(item) { console.log(item.checked, 'Initial Checkbox checked status'); }); var listItems = document.querySelectorAll('.subscription-options li'); if (listItems.length === 0) return; var anyActive = false; listItems.forEach(function(item) { var checkbox = item.querySelector('input[type="checkbox"]'); if (checkbox) { if (checkbox.checked) { item.classList.add('active'); anyActive = true; // Set anyActive to true } else { item.classList.remove('active'); // Remove 'active' class if checkbox is unchecked } } }); } function updateButtonText(anyActive) { var subscribeButtonSpan = document.querySelector('.subscribe-submit .changeBtnText'); } document.addEventListener('click', function(event) { var clickedItem = event.target.closest('.subscription-options li'); if (clickedItem) { var checkbox = clickedItem.querySelector('input[type="checkbox"]'); if (checkbox) { checkbox.checked = !checkbox.checked; updateSubscriptionButton(); } } });

body: The post Ceramic Liberty (CL8Y) Announces Major Milestones and Upcoming Tech Releases appeared first on Coinpedia Fintech News Ceramic Liberty (CL8Y) is a decentralized and deflationary meme coin designed to support open-source development. title: Bitcoin Could Hit $112,000, But Only If It Holds Above This Key Level ‚Äì Analyst Explains
body: In an X post published yesterday, seasoned crypto analyst Ali Martinez highlighted that, based on price band analysis, Bitcoin (BTC) could surge to $112,000 if it breaks and holds above a key level. Analyst Outlines Key Bitcoin Level Following a slight uptick after the US Federal Reserve‚Äôs (Fed) announcement to slow the pace of its balance sheet drawdown, Bitcoin is currently trading in the low $80,000 price range. However, according to Martinez, the leading cryptocurrency could reach a new all-time high (ATH), subject to certain conditions. Related Reading: Bitcoin Needs Weekly Close Above This Level To Confirm Market Bottom, Analyst Says Using Market Value to Realized Value (MVRV) Extreme Deviation Pricing Bands, Martinez pointed to two crucial price levels that could determine Bitcoin‚Äôs next major move. According to the analyst, if BTC breaks and holds above $94,000, it has a ‚Äòhigh probability‚Äô of rallying to $112,000. On the flip side, if BTC falls below $76,000, it risks plunging to $58,000 ‚Äì or even $44,000 ‚Äì if market conditions turn bearish. Notably, BTC previously hit $76,606 on March 10 before rebounding to its current range in the low $80,000s. For the uninitiated, MVRV Extreme Deviation Pricing Bands show whether an asset, like Bitcoin, is priced too high or too low compared to its past averages. It helps spot when the market might be overbought ‚Äì potential market top ‚Äì or oversold ‚Äì potential buying opportunity. According to Martinez‚Äôs chart, BTC is currently trading between the mean ‚Äì yellow band ‚Äì and +0.5 standard deviation ‚Äì orange band. A sustained breakout above or below these bands could indicate Bitcoin‚Äôs next significant price direction. Fellow crypto analyst Rekt Capital noted that Bitcoin is re-testing the crucial $84,000 support level. A successful hold at this price could set BTC up to challenge the $94,000 resistance, potentially paving the way for a new ATH. The analyst stated: BTC has produced long wicks below this level before which is why a Daily Close above $84k is essential for this retest to be successful. Will BTC Witness A Short Squeeze? In a separate X post, crypto trader Merlijn The Trader suggested that widespread pessimism around BTC‚Äôs recent price action might fuel a powerful short squeeze. According to the analyst, roughly $2 billion worth of short positions could be liquidated if BTC reaches $87,000 ‚Äì potentially driving the price even higher. Related Reading: Is Bitcoin Undervalued? Crypto Sentiment Index Flashes ‚ÄúMassive Contrarian Buy Signal‚Äù Adding to the bullish outlook, crypto entrepreneur Arthur Hayes suggested that BTC‚Äôs March 10 drop to $77,000 may have marked the bottom of this market cycle. At the time of writing, BTC is trading at $84,043, down 2% in the past 24 hours. Featured image from Unsplash, Charts from X and TradingView.com
tags: Bitcoin News|bitcoin|btc|BTCUSDT|cryptocurrency|digital asset|MVRV Extreme Deviation Pricing Bands|short squeeze|technical analysis

title: Could Dogecoin price fall even further and introduce a zero to its price by the end of March 2025?
body: Dogecoin (DOGE) has been in freefall for weeks, leaving investors questioning how much further it could drop. With liquidations piling up, trading volume surging, and market sentiment turning increasingly bearish, analysts are now speculating on an unsettling possibility‚Äîcould DOGE lose so much value that it adds another zero to its price before March 2025 ends? How Dogecoin‚Äôs downtrend could wipe out its price stability Dogecoin‚Äôs decline has been steep and persistent. The meme coin has already lost 38% over the past month, with its price presently at $0.16 as of writing. DOGE is among the most severely damaged top cryptocurrencies in the current market downturn, losing 20% of its value within only one week. Dogecoin Price Chart (24-Hour), Mar. 11, 2025 | Source: CoinGecko The numbers depict a troubling picture. Over $21.94 million in Dogecoin positions have been liquidated in the previous 24 hours, with $18.51 million coming from long positions‚Äîa strong hint that traders expecting a rebound are being wiped out. Dogecoin‚Äôs market cap, which once rocketed beyond $60 billion, has since plummeted drastically to $23.86 billion. Meanwhile, trading volume remains at $2.6 billion, warning panic selling could accelerate. Is Dogecoin on the verge of adding another zero to its price? A few months ago, DOGE rocketed beyond $0.47 due to post-election euphoria and Elon Musk‚Äôs ongoing backing. However, with Bitcoin (BTC) failing to hold its $100,000 milestone, the entire market has hit, and meme currencies have suffered the most. Analysts fear that if the current decline persists, DOGE could drop below $0.10, reintroducing a zero to its price and causing significant market disruptions. While speculation about a prospective Dogecoin ETF from Bitwise or Grayscale continues, it may not be enough to rescue the meme coin from further fall. As Dogecoin investors explore alternatives, one project stands out for its excellent fundamentals, rapid usage, and zero VC risk: Rexas Finance (RXS). Rexas Finance (RXS): a real-world crypto powerhouse gaining market traction Rexas Finance (RXS) is built on actual financial use cases, unlike Dogecoin, which lives on speculation. Fundamentally, Rexas Finance specializes in real-world asset (RWA) tokenization, a growing industry expected to reach $30 trillion by 2030. The platform makes worldwide investing more possible by allowing fractional ownership of classic assets such as real estate, bonds, and commodities. Rexas Finance is positioned at the vanguard of this change as big financial firms like JPMorgan, BlackRock, and Goldman Sachs have already delved into RWA tokenization. Rexas Finance recently reached 50,000 active holders, a key milestone in its rapid expansion. This rise in adoption demonstrates the project‚Äôs long-term viability and investor trust in its roadmap. Inside the Rexas Finance presale: a project with no VC sell-off risks With 91% of tokens already sold, the Rexas Finance (RXS) presale is now in its last stage (Stage 12). It is one of the most successful cryptocurrency launches of the year, with $47.2 million raised and 456 million tokens sold. One of the main worries with new crypto ventures is VC dumping. In this situation, venture capitalists buy early allocations cheaply to offload them to regular investors once the tokens are listed on exchanges. Rexas Finance guarantees a fair token distribution by rejecting VC money, removing this risk. Before the exchange launch, the presale price rose 567% from $0.03 in Stage 1 to $0.20 in Stage 12. Investor demand and project sustainability confidence drove this growth. Beyond tokenization: what makes Rexas Finance more than just a RWA platform While RWA tokenization is the foundation of Rexas Finance, the project also provides a diverse range of blockchain-powered financial services that appeal to institutional and retail investors. Here are some of its outstanding utilities: Rexas AI Shield: An AI-driven smart contract security technology that finds weaknesses before hackers can exploit them, protecting user funds. Rexas Treasury: A multi-chain staking and yield optimizer that maximizes Ethereum, Binance Smart Chain, and Polygon investment earnings. Rexas Launchpad: A decentralized platform for innovators to raise funds for their tokenization projects. These real-world utilities ensure that Rexas Finance is more than a speculative token; it is an ecosystem that transforms how financial assets are handled, exchanged, and secured on the blockchain. Rexas Finance exchange listing: what investors can expect Investors look forward to June 19, the official listing date for RXS on at least three of the world‚Äôs top ten cryptocurrency exchanges. Historically, high-profile exchange launches have resulted in significant price increases, and RXS will likely follow suit. The listing price is set at $0.25, and given the liquidity and exposure from tier-1 exchanges, industry analysts estimate 45,000% post-launch returns. Given its solid tokenomics, early investor demand, and real-world utility, Rexas Finance is poised to be one of the most promising crypto investments of 2025, mainly as investors shift away from speculative assets such as DOGE. Final thoughts: will Dogecoin collapse as Rexas Finance soars? Dogecoin‚Äôs failure to maintain crucial price levels is generating investor fears. If the current trend continues, DOGE might go below $0.10, adding another zero to its price by the end of March 2025. Meanwhile, Rexas Finance is on a unique path. With a rapidly growing user base, solid financial support, and a varied ecosystem of real-world applications, Rexas Finance is emerging as a prominent cryptocurrency competitor in 2025. title: Ripple calls on SEC to ditch enforcement-first approach after key legal victory
body: Crypto exchange Ripple asks the SEC to focus on setting clear regulatory guidance for crypto companies and abandon past enforcement strategies. According to Ripple, the past commission‚Äôs actions created confusion for the crypto industry, as the agency enforced standards that were not written into law. Ripple says the past SEC‚Äôs enforcement actions aroused confusion in the crypto industry Responding to a February 21, 2025, SEC statement titled ‚ÄúThere must be some way out of here‚Äù (the ‚ÄúRFI‚Äù), Ripple insisted that the commission needs to prioritise providing law-first clarity for crypto companies. In its letter, the exchange referenced Bob Dylan‚Äôs lyric, ‚ÄúThere‚Äôs too much confusion, I can‚Äôt get no relief,‚Äù claiming the previous administration only generated confusion. It further argued that previous enforcement strategies were inconsistent with the Crypto Task Force‚Äôs goal of establishing clear criteria for determining whether an asset qualifies as a security or is part of an investment contract. Echoing this sentiment, Stuart Alderoty, Ripple‚Äôs chief legal officer, even claimed the commission thrived on confusion to mask its failure to follow the law. Today, @Ripple submitted its response to Commissioner @HesterPeirce ‚Äôs Feb. 21 statement: ‚ÄúThere must be some way out of here,‚Äù calling for public input on crypto taxonomy rules. That Dylan lyric continues: ‚ÄúThere‚Äôs too much confusion, I can‚Äôt get no relief.‚Äù The prior‚Ä¶ ‚Äî Stuart Alderoty (@s_alderoty) March 21, 2025 The exchange now wants the SEC to provide more clarity and return to first principles. It commented: ‚ÄúAs the Crypto Task Force appears to recognize, the SEC should return to first principles and, within the bounds of existing statutes, strive to provide straightforward market guidance that has been absent to date.‚Äù ‚Äì Ripple Ripple even claimed that the SEC does not have jurisdiction over most digital assets and their transactions to date. It added that the agency can only regulate ‚Äúsecurities‚Äù and their transactions as defined by the Securities Act. The crypto firm also argued that staking and yield on public networks differ from securities and asked them to clarify the policies. Additionally, the company reaffirmed its backing for safe harbor provisions and regulatory sandboxes, an approach that has worked well in the UK, Switzerland, and Singapore. The exchange believes the Token Safe Harbor Proposal could allow blockchain projects to grow without being too quickly tagged as securities. Ripple believes the SEC misused some legal definitions, including the Howey Test Ripple, however, accused the SEC of distorting some of the legal requirements for exchanges, including the application of the Howey Test. The crypto company claimed that the agency misused the test to classify digital assets as securities, even without binding agreements or profit participation requirements. Ripple claimed that this approach only created uncertainty and hindered blockchain projects from launching or expanding in the US. The exchange, however, agreed with the SEC‚Äôs decision to categorize meme coins as non-securities, claiming it‚Äôs a step toward clear regulation. Moving forward, the firm believes that all future regulation should be based on existing laws and not on arbitrary constructed norms that could unsettle the markets. title: Tether seeks Big Four firm for its first full financial audit ‚Äî Report
body: Stablecoin issuer Tether is reportedly engaging with a Big Four accounting firm to audit its assets reserve and verify that its USDT ( USDT ) stablecoin is backed at a 1:1 ratio. Tether CEO Paolo Ardoino reportedly said the audit process would be more straightforward under pro-crypto US President Donald Trump. It comes after rising industry concerns over a potential FTX-style liquidity crisis for Tether due to its lack of third-party audits. Tether to produce first full audit after scrutiny ‚ÄúIf the President of the United States says this is top priority for the US, Big Four auditing firms will have to listen, so we are very happy with that,‚Äù Ardoino told Reuters on March 21. ‚ÄúIt‚Äôs our top priority,‚Äù Ardoino said. It was reported that Tether is currently subject to quarterly reports but not a full independent annual audit, which is much more extensive and provides more assurance to investors and regulators. However, Ardoino did not specify which of the Big Four accounting firms ‚Äî PricewaterhouseCoopers (PwC), Ernst & Young (EY), Deloitte, or KPMG ‚Äî he plans to engage. Tether recorded a profit of $13.7 billion in 2024. Source: Paolo Ardoino Tether‚Äôs USDT maintains its stable value by claiming to be pegged to the US dollar at a 1:1 ratio . This means each USDT token is backed by reserves equivalent to its circulating supply. These reserves include traditional currency, cash equivalents and other assets. Earlier this month, Tether hired Simon McWilliams as chief financial officer in preparation for a full financial audit. Industry concerns over Tether‚Äôs lack of audits In September 2024, Cyber Capital founder Justin Bons was among those in the industry who voiced concerns about Tether‚Äôs lack of transparency. ‚Äú[Tether is] one of the biggest existential threats to crypto. As we have to trust they hold $118B in collateral without proof! Even after the CFTC fined Tether for lying about their reserves in 2021,‚Äù Bons said. Related: Tether freezes $27M USDT on sanctioned Russian exchange Garantex Around the same time, Consumers‚Äô Research, a consumer protection group , published a report criticizing Tether for its lack of transparency. Just three years prior, in 2021, the United States Commodities and Futures Trading Commission (CFTC) fined Tether a $41 million civil monetary penalty for lying about USDT being fully backed by reserves. Meanwhile, more recently, Tether has voiced disappointment over new European regulations that have forced exchanges like Crypto.com to delist USDT and nine other tokens to comply with MiCA. ‚ÄúIt is disappointing to see the rushed actions brought on by statements which do little to clarify the basis for such moves,‚Äù a spokesperson for Tether told Cointelegraph. Cointelegraph reached out to Tether but did not receive a response by time of publication. Magazine: Dummies guide to native rollups: L2s as secure as Ethereum itself

title: Why XRP Price Hasn‚Äôt 3x Despite SEC Dropping Ripple Case ‚Äì Software Engineer Explains
body: Software engineer Vincent Van Code provided a detailed analysis of the U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC) dropping its appeal against Ripple. His commentary focused on the significance of this decision and its implications for XRP. Van Code explained that the primary risk in the SEC‚Äôs appeal was the potential challenge to Judge Torres‚Äô ruling, which determined that ‚ÄúXRP in and of itself, is not a security.‚Äù This ruling had left XRP in a state of uncertainty, particularly among financial institutions and large investors. Van Code stated that the appeal presented ‚Äúthe big RISK which left XRP in a state of limbo with big banks and institutions.‚Äù He also reminded readers that Ripple was fined $125 million for its institutional sales, which the court ruled violated securities laws. He clarified that ‚ÄúRipple ALREADY PAID the fine and is sitting in a bank escrow ready to be released upon clarity of the appeal.‚Äù This means that Ripple had already accounted for this penalty, removing any further financial uncertainty related to the SEC‚Äôs claims. Van Code noted that while Ripple‚Äôs legal team has suggested they may appeal the ruling on institutional sales, this is a separate matter. He emphasized that, regardless of future legal actions, the fundamental outcome of the SEC‚Äôs dropped appeal is that ‚Äúthe UNDISPUTED RULE OF THE LAND IS: XRP IS NOT A SECURITY AND NEVER WILL BE, CASE CLOSED!‚Äù With this legal status confirmed, Van Code stated that Ripple and its extensive network of 1,500 partners no longer have to worry about regulatory threats from the SEC. We are on twitter, follow us to connect with us :- @TimesTabloid1 ‚Äî TimesTabloid (@TimesTabloid1) July 15, 2023 XRP Market Reactions and Institutional Adoption Despite this legal clarity, Van Code addressed why XRP‚Äôs price had not significantly increased. He acknowledged his expectations, saying he thought the price would have ‚Äú3x already‚Äù and admitted he was surprised by the lack of movement. He pointed to market dynamics as a key factor. According to Van Code, ‚Äúthere is STILL very little volume,‚Äù suggesting that major financial institutions are not yet actively accumulating. He stated that much of the current activity is ‚Äúthe usual market manipulation by Binance and their VIP trading bots.‚Äù He also explained that institutional investors often take time to react to legal developments. Large financial players ‚Äúare not trigger happy‚Äù and may require board approval for significant purchases, which could slow down their decision-making process. He noted that such approvals are often granted during monthly meetings, further delaying potential buying pressure on XRP. Future Outlook and Investor Patience Van Code made it clear that, in his view, the risk associated with XRP has now been eliminated. He argued that there is now ‚Äúnothing stopping its adoption‚Äù and that there are no foreseeable events that could significantly impact its price negatively. Looking ahead, he suggested that the market will see continued upward momentum, stating, ‚ÄúThe rest of the journey Imho is all the way up.‚Äù However, he acknowledged the unpredictability of price movements, admitting, ‚ÄúI won‚Äôt pretend to know price, heck I humbly admit I have been wrong too many times.‚Äù Finally, he advised patience, warning that the biggest obstacle for investors now is ‚Äúimpatience.‚Äù He encouraged holders to ‚Äújust sit tight, enjoy the victory and start to plan how you will manage your new fortunes.‚Äù Van Code‚Äôs analysis clearly shows the SEC‚Äôs decision and its impact on XRP and Ripple . The regulatory uncertainty that previously clouded XRP‚Äôs future has now been removed, confirming its legal status. Despite this, market reactions remain slow, with institutional investors likely accumulating XRP over time. He emphasizes patience, reinforcing his belief that XRP‚Äôs adoption will continue without regulatory obstacles. Disclaimer : This content is meant to inform and should not be considered financial advice. The views expressed in this article may include the author‚Äôs personal opinions and do not represent Times Tabloid‚Äôs opinion. Readers are urged to do in-depth research before making any investment decisions. Any action taken by the reader is strictly at their own risk. Times Tabloid is not responsible for any financial losses. title: IMF Recognizes Cryptocurrencies in Global Economic Data for the First Time
body: The post IMF Recognizes Cryptocurrencies in Global Economic Data for the First Time appeared first on Coinpedia Fintech News The International Monetary Fund (IMF) has updated its balance of payments standards to account for the rising influence of digital assets. IMF Adds Bitcoin to Global Economic Stats! In its latest seventh edition of the Balance of Payments Manual (BPM7), IMF included cryptocurrencies such as Bitcoin (BTC) in the balance of payments. According to the IMF‚Äôs new standards, Bitcoin and similar cryptocurrencies are now non-productive assets in global economic statistics. The updated manual was released on March 20, marking the first time that the IMF has included detailed guidance on digital assets in its global statistical standards. The IMF‚Äôs new framework splits digital assets into fungible and non-fungible tokens and further classifies them based on whether they have associated liabilities. Bitcoin and similar tokens without liabilities are treated as capital assets, while stablecoins backed by liabilities are seen as financial instruments. According to the IMF, crypto assets like Bitcoin, which are not linked to liabilities and serve as a medium of exchange, are categorized as non-produced nonfinancial assets and recorded in the capital account. In practice, this would mean cross-border crypto transactions involving assets like Bitcoin will be tracked as acquisitions or sales of non-produced assets in the capital account. Meanwhile, tokens tied to a platform, like Ethereum or Solana (SOL), may be treated like equity holdings in the financial account if the owner is from a different country than the token‚Äôs origin. For instance, if a UK investor holds Solana tokens from the US, it would be treated like owning foreign stocks, recorded as ‚Äúequity crypto assets.‚Äù The IMF highlights that, despite using cryptography, these assets are similar to standard equity when it comes to ownership rights. Staking and Crypto Yields Furthermore, the IMF acknowledges the complexity of staking and crypto yields, noting that rewards from holding tokens could be treated like equity dividends and recorded as income, based on the size and purpose of the holdings. Notably, this update helps countries better track the economic impact of digital assets. The IMF now treats activities like mining or staking, which help validate crypto transactions, as services. These will be included in computer services exports and imports. Created with input from over 160 countries, the BPM7 manual will guide global economic data. While its application may differ by country, it‚Äôs a big step toward recognizing the economic impact of digital assets worldwide.

title: Exciting News: Bithumb to Launch ACX/KRW Spot Trading Pair This Week
body: Get ready for a new opportunity in the crypto market! South Korean exchange giant, Bithumb, has just announced a significant update that‚Äôs sure to pique the interest of traders. Prepare for the launch of the ACX/KRW spot trading pair, set to go live on March 22nd. This exciting development opens doors for traders looking to diversify their portfolios and tap into new trading avenues. Let‚Äôs dive into what this means for you and the broader crypto landscape. What‚Äôs the Buzz About the Bithumb Listing of ACX/KRW? Bithumb, a leading cryptocurrency exchange in South Korea, has officially announced the upcoming listing of the ACX/KRW spot trading pair. This announcement, made on their official website, confirms that starting March 22nd at 09:00 UTC, users will be able to trade ACX directly against the Korean Won (KRW) on the Bithumb platform. This move is significant for several reasons, offering both opportunities and raising some questions for crypto enthusiasts. But first, let‚Äôs understand what exactly spot trading is and why this listing is generating attention. Understanding Spot Trading and Its Significance Spot trading is the most fundamental type of trading in any financial market, including cryptocurrencies. In spot trading, assets are exchanged for immediate delivery. When Bithumb lists the ACX/KRW spot trading pair , it means traders can buy or sell ACX using KRW directly, with the transaction settling ‚Äòon the spot‚Äô or very shortly after the order is filled. This is different from futures or margin trading, where you are trading contracts based on the asset‚Äôs price, not the asset itself. The introduction of a new crypto trading pair like ACX/KRW on a reputable exchange like Bithumb is important because: Increased Accessibility: It makes ACX more accessible to the South Korean market, allowing users who prefer to trade in their local currency (KRW) to easily participate in the ACX market. Enhanced Liquidity: Listing on Bithumb, a major exchange, typically increases the liquidity of the asset. Higher liquidity means it‚Äôs easier to buy and sell ACX without significant price slippage. Wider Market Exposure: It exposes ACX to a larger pool of traders and investors, potentially leading to increased trading volume and price discovery. Validation for ACX: Being listed on a prominent exchange like Bithumb can be seen as a form of validation for the ACX project, potentially boosting its credibility and appeal. Why Bithumb Chose to List the ACX/KRW Pair? While Bithumb‚Äôs official announcement is straightforward, it doesn‚Äôt explicitly state the reasons behind choosing to list the ACX/KRW pair now. However, we can infer some potential motivations: Market Demand: Bithumb likely assesses market demand before listing a new pair. If there‚Äôs a growing interest in ACX among their user base or in the South Korean crypto market generally, listing the ACX/KRW pair caters to this demand. Diversification of Trading Options: Exchanges constantly seek to diversify their offerings to attract and retain users. Adding new and potentially popular trading pairs like ACX/KRW expands the trading options available on Bithumb. Strategic Partnerships: Listings can sometimes be the result of strategic partnerships or agreements between the exchange and the project behind the cryptocurrency. While not confirmed in this announcement, it‚Äôs a possibility. Expanding the Crypto Ecosystem: Exchanges play a crucial role in expanding the overall cryptocurrency ecosystem. By listing new and promising projects, they contribute to the growth and diversification of the market. Benefits of Trading the ACX/KRW Pair on Bithumb For traders and investors, the launch of the ACX/KRW cryptocurrency exchange pair on Bithumb brings several potential benefits: Direct KRW Trading: South Korean users can now trade ACX directly using their local currency, eliminating the need to first convert KRW to another cryptocurrency like USDT or BTC. This simplifies the trading process and can potentially reduce trading fees. Access to Bithumb‚Äôs Platform: Traders gain access to Bithumb‚Äôs robust trading platform, known for its user-friendly interface, security features, and relatively high trading volumes. Potential for Price Discovery: The new listing can contribute to price discovery for ACX in the KRW market. Increased trading activity and liquidity can lead to a more efficient and transparent price for ACX against KRW. Portfolio Diversification: Adding ACX to a trading portfolio can offer diversification benefits. By trading different cryptocurrencies, investors can potentially spread risk and capitalize on different market opportunities. Bithumb to list ACX/KRW spot trading pair Navigating the Challenges and Risks While the Bithumb listing of ACX/KRW presents exciting opportunities, it‚Äôs crucial to be aware of the inherent challenges and risks associated with crypto trading, especially with new listings: Market Volatility: Cryptocurrency markets are notoriously volatile. New listings can sometimes experience even higher volatility in the initial trading days and weeks. Traders should be prepared for potential price swings. Liquidity Risks: While listing on Bithumb should improve liquidity, it‚Äôs still important to monitor the order book depth and trading volume, especially in the initial phase. Lower liquidity can lead to wider spreads and price slippage. Project Risks: Investing in any cryptocurrency carries project-specific risks. It‚Äôs essential to conduct thorough research on the ACX project, its fundamentals, team, technology, and roadmap before trading. Regulatory Landscape: The regulatory landscape for cryptocurrencies is constantly evolving, particularly in South Korea. Traders should stay informed about any regulatory developments that could impact crypto trading. Actionable Insights for Traders So, how can traders make the most of this new listing? Here are some actionable insights: Do Your Research: Before trading ACX/KRW, thoroughly research the ACX project. Understand its use case, technology, tokenomics, and community. Monitor Trading Volumes: Keep an eye on the trading volume of the ACX/KRW pair on Bithumb after the listing. Volume can be an indicator of market interest and liquidity. Start Small: If you‚Äôre new to trading ACX or crypto in general, consider starting with smaller trades to manage risk and get comfortable with the market dynamics. Use Risk Management Tools: Utilize Bithumb‚Äôs risk management tools, such as stop-loss orders, to protect your capital and manage potential losses. Stay Informed: Keep up-to-date with news and developments related to ACX, Bithumb, and the broader crypto market to make informed trading decisions. Conclusion: A Promising Step for ACX and Bithumb The upcoming listing of the ACX/KRW spot trading pair on Bithumb is undoubtedly a positive development for both ACX and the Bithumb exchange. It provides increased accessibility, liquidity, and market exposure for ACX, while offering Bithumb users a new and potentially attractive trading option. As with any crypto investment, it‚Äôs crucial for traders to approach this new opportunity with informed caution, conduct thorough research, and manage risk effectively. The launch of ACX/KRW on Bithumb marks another step forward in the dynamic world of cryptocurrency trading, offering fresh avenues for engagement and growth within the digital asset ecosystem. To learn more about the latest crypto market trends, explore our article on key developments shaping Bitcoin price action.

title: EVAA and Tonstakers Announce Major Upgrade to Earn Section: Higher Rewards, Full Liquidity, and Seamless Access
body: EVAA, in partnership with Tonstakers, announces the release of the Earn section, introducing leveraged liquid staking to make it more accessible and capital-efficient for DeFi users. With 61.5M TON in TVL and nearly 100,000 stakers, Tonstakers is TON‚Äôs leading liquid staking protocol. Its tsTON liquid staking token is integrated with all major TON DeFi protocols, enabling users to get more rewards in addition to staking rewards. A New Standard for Liquid Staking Key benefits of leveraged liquid staking on Tonstakers with EVAA include: Low-cost borrowing : TON at 0.37% APR with USDT & TSTON as collateral. High-yield staking looping : Up to 7.89% APY with automatic compounding. Instant withdrawals: No waiting period, full liquidity. Dynamic Looping & Total Yield Calculation The EVAA Earn update enables Tonstakers users to leverage their staking position to increase staking rewards. As shown in the new EVAA Earn interface, a dynamic ‚ÄúLoops Amount‚Äù selector has been introduced, allowing users to define the number of staking and reinvestment cycles within EVAA + Tonstakers. The process follows a looping strategy : Stake TON with Tonstakers. Supply tsTON to EVAA. Borrow TON and repeat the cycle. Total Yield is automatically calculated, streamlining the process for both retail users and large-scale investors. This upgrade enhances usability, making the platform more intuitive for all users and everyday users alike , and reinforcing our mission to build a truly user-friendly DeFi ecosystem. Maximizing EVAA XP Rewards EVAA Protocol offers EVAA XP for borrowing TON. The more cycles of supplying stTON and borrowing TON you complete, the more EVAA XP you earn. EVAA XP (Experience Points) is a key component of the Earn section, designed to enhance user incentives. It rewards users for borrowing TON and plays a crucial role in determining the future allocation of $EVAA tokens after the Token Generation Event (TGE). Each iteration of borrowing TON generates additional XP. This means that users actively engaging in looping strategies will accumulate more XP, further increasing their potential rewards. Seamless Access Across Major Wallets The upgraded Earn section is now available across: Tonkeeper TON Space (@ Wallet) MyTonWallet Binance Wallet Bitget Wallet Bybit Wallet Gateio Wallet OKX Wallet ‚ÄúThis upgrade represents a major step forward in making liquid staking more efficient and accessible,‚Äù said Vladislav Blizniuk , CTO at EVAA. ‚ÄúBy integrating deeper with the TON DeFi ecosystem, we‚Äôre unlocking new ways for users to earn while maintaining liquidity.‚Äù ‚ÄúThis EVAA Earn update unlocks new ways to maximize Tonstakers staking rewards, adding more value for our users and strengthening the entire DeFi ecosystem,‚Äù said Roman D., CEO of Tonstakers. About EVAA & Tonstakers EVAA‚Äîthe leading DeFi protocol built on TON, offering innovative liquidity market solutions and leveraged staking strategies. With a focus on efficiency and accessibility, EVAA enables users to borrow, stake, and reinvest seamlessly, maximizing capital utilization without compromising liquidity. The platform is integrated with Telegram, top-tier TON applications, and wallets, ensuring a frictionless experience for both institutional and retail users. Tonstakers‚Äîthe leading liquid staking protocol on TON, providing secure, non-custodial staking while maximizing rewards. It enhances staking mechanics with tsTON, a liquid staking token that maintains staked TON liquidity and allows users to earn additional rewards in external DeFi protocols alongside regular staking rewards. Beyond securing the TON network, Tonstakers continues to expand the ecosystem‚Äôs global reach through strategic partnerships and integrations, including its recent native integration with Crypto.com. Together, EVAA and Tonstakers provide a next-generation staking experience, merging capital efficiency with DeFi innovation to unlock new earning opportunities in the TON ecosystem.

title: Shiba Inu Price Eyes 81% Upside With SHIB Burn Rate Rising
body: Over the past week, the Shiba Inu price has faced strong volatility, however, it has managed to hold above the $0.0000125 support levels. Furthermore, large volume transactions for SHIB and rising burn rate can serve as an additional catalyst for the same. Technical chart indicators show that a SHIB breakout can lead to an 81% upside for the second-largest meme coin. Shiba Inu Price Breakout Can Trigger 81% Upside Shiba Inu price is showing signs of a potential bullish reversal as it breaks out of a falling wedge pattern on the daily timeframe. The daily chart shows SHIB trading within a descending channel that has been in place since December 2024, with the price recently testing the upper boundary of this channel. The cryptocurrency reached a high of $0.00001303 and a low of $0.00001293 during this period as shown in the below image. Source: Crypto SHIB As shown in the above image, a breakout from this descending channel can trigger the next SHIB bull rally with a potential target of 81% on the upside. Some market analysts are also predicting a 17x Shiba Inu rally from here onwards. Shiba Inu Transaction Volumes on the Rise With the Shiba Inu price staging a rebound to $0.00001367 yesterday, the network has witnessed a large transaction volume for the same. On-chain data from IntoTheBlock revealed a significant spike in large Shiba Inu transactions, each valued at $100,000 or more, on March 20. This coincided with the SHIB price seeing a surge past $0.000013 levels for the first time in a week. The total volume of these transactions rose to 7.49 trillion SHIB, valued at over $97 million at the $0.000013 price point. Thus, it shows a massive 197% jump from the 2.52 trillion SHIB traded the previous day. Source: IntoTheBlock Over the last weekend, the SHIB transactions dropped to a low of 571 billion. However, whale activity has resumed once again showing potential interest from big players. The latest spike of 7.49 trillion SHIB marks the highest transaction volume in nearly two months. SHIB Burn Rate on the Rise As per the data from SHIBBurn , the overall Shiba Inu burn rate has surged by 21% in the last 24 hours, now moving past $17.1 million. Over the past week, we have seen a strong surge in the SHIB burn rate thereby raising overall market optimism surrounding the meme coin. Following the latest burn event, the total number of Shiba Inu tokens permanently removed from circulation has climbed to 410,745,403,545,103. title: XRP Price Analysis: Analyst States Key Levels for Bullish Confirmation
body: Crypto analyst Egrag Crypto recently shared an updated technical analysis of XRP, highlighting crucial price levels and the potential formation of either a double bottom or a fifth-wave downward movement. His post, accompanied by a detailed price chart, outlines the importance of key resistance levels and the implications of XRP‚Äôs price action in the coming weeks. Egrag Crypto introduced the analysis with a reference to what some traders humorously call the ‚ÄúDouble Boob‚Äù chart pattern, referring to a possible double-bottom formation. He emphasized the importance of XRP closing above a critical resistance zone: ‚ÄúIf #XRP fails to close above the $2.65-$2.70 range, it won‚Äôt negate wave 4 and will likely lead us down to the 5th wave.‚Äù #XRP ‚Äì Double Bottom or Wave 5 Downward? ?(Update) As the Aussies like to call it, the "Double Boob" chart! If #XRP fails to close above the $2.65-$2.70 range, it won't negate wave 4 and will likely lead us down to the 5th wave. BUT #EGRAGCRYPTO , the #SEC dropping the‚Ä¶ https://t.co/WDA5TeqZJU pic.twitter.com/uOKaZuW2hX ‚Äî EGRAG CRYPTO (@egragcrypto) March 19, 2025 Egrag‚Äôs statement underscores the need for XRP to maintain upward momentum to avoid a bearish scenario. According to his analysis, failure to achieve a strong close above this range could result in a downward move, confirming the fifth wave in Elliott Wave theory. Regulatory Developments and Market Sentiment Egrag also addressed the broader market sentiment following recent developments with the SEC dropping its case against Ripple . He acknowledged the significance of this event while maintaining a focus on technical analysis. He stated ‚ÄúThis is a significant win for long-term adoption and utility, reinforcing our belief in the valuable use case of #XRP. In the short term, I need to stick to math, numbers, and charts.‚Äù Egrag‚Äôs response indicates that while legal clarity benefits XRP‚Äôs long-term outlook, short-term price movements remain dictated by technical factors rather than market sentiment alone. We are on twitter, follow us to connect with us :- @TimesTabloid1 ‚Äî TimesTabloid (@TimesTabloid1) July 15, 2023 Key Price Levels for a Bullish Breakout The analysis outlined a structured approach to confirming a bullish trend. Egrag Crypto identified three critical price levels that traders should monitor: ‚ÄúA close above $2.66 would be a good sign, followed by another close above $2.97 as a second #Bullish confirmation. The ultimate confirmation for a bullish trend would be a close at $3.40.‚Äù These resistance levels serve as milestones for XRP‚Äôs potential upward movement . If XRP successfully reaches $3.40, Egrag suggests that the next major targets will be between $5 and $8. He concluded with reassurance that the broader market outlook remains intact despite short-term fluctuations: Technical Outlook and Market Implications The chart accompanying his analysis provides a visual representation of these targets, Fibonacci retracement levels, and potential price movements. The image suggests that XRP is testing resistance while attempting to confirm a breakout. Egrag Crypto‚Äôs technical outlook emphasizes the importance of XRP maintaining strong closes above these key levels to confirm bullish momentum. As XRP navigates this crucial range, traders will be closely watching whether it can sustain upward movement or if it will face another corrective wave. title: XRP Unleashed? Here‚Äôs How High it Could Fly After Ripple‚Äôs SEC Victory (ChatGPT Insight)
body: TL;DR The XRP army got the news it was waiting for earlier this week, as company CEO Brad Garlinghouse triumphantly announced the closure of Ripple‚Äôs legal case against the SEC. With such a big burden behind it, how high can XRP go? Here‚Äôs what ChatGPT had to say. How High (XRP)? The native token of the Ripple ecosystem skyrocketed in the months after the US elections on the hype that the local regulatory landscape would change, and its legal case against the SEC, which continued for over four years, could come to a favorable closure for the company. As with many other similar events that are highly anticipated by the community, the asset‚Äôs value rose ahead of the actual development in what is known as a ‚Äò buy-the-rumor ‚Äò rally. Although XRP spiked by double-digits after Garlinghouse‚Äôs announcement , it quickly lost momentum, and it‚Äôs currently 1% down on a weekly scale. However, there could be long-term implications for XRP, especially if the SEC clears its name and even classifies it as a commodity, as recent reports claimed . Consequently, we decided to ask ChatGPT about XRP‚Äôs price potential in the following months (and maybe years) after the end of this big battle. In terms of a price target for 2025, the popular AI chatbot highlighted a range between $5 and $7. This would require XRP to break its 2018 all-time high and even double its price from then to tap the bigger mark. Although this sounds promising and slightly unlikely given the current market conditions, ChatGPT brought an even more bullish scenario, which could see XRP rise to $10-$15 within the next 18 months. There‚Äôs also an extreme case, which foresees a surge to $20-$30. What Could Drive Such Mindblowing Rallies? The AI solution noted that the main drivers behind such notable (and perhaps far-fetched) price increases are as follows: Wider adoption of Ripple‚Äôs XRPL ledger and XRP token to be used for cross-border payments and whale accumulation . Increased institutional confidence and adoption, which could be enhanced after the lawsuit‚Äôs end. Potential ETF approval in the States ‚Äì there are several such filings with the local regulator, and the chances for a green light went up exponentially after Garlinghouse‚Äôs announcement. Major partnerships for Ripple ‚Äì the ending of the case could mean that more big names are open to working with Ripple and signing lucrative collaborations. A global pivot toward blockchain-based settlements where XRPL could be a leader. XRP to become a ‚Äúbridge asset for CBDCs or international remittances at scale.‚Äù ‚Äì concluded ChatGPT. Obviously, many (if not all) of those factors have to align for XRP to surge to any of the aforementioned targets, which, at the moment, doesn‚Äôt seem too likely. However, the landscape in crypto can change just as quickly as it did in the past few months, and XRP has already proven that it could registered triple-digit price surges in a very short period of time. The post XRP Unleashed? Here‚Äôs How High it Could Fly After Ripple‚Äôs SEC Victory (ChatGPT Insight) appeared first on CryptoPotato .

title: Is Ethena Price At Risk? Market Maker Offloads $10M ENA Raising Concerns
body: Ethena price remains concerningly eyed by crypto market participants against the backdrop of a severe bearish trajectory. ENA erased nearly 4% in the past 24 hours, in sync with a renowned market maker dumping over $10 million worth of tokens. Thus, traders and investors anticipate additional short-term volatility in the coin, whilst it recently faced rejection at a key resistance of $0.48. Ethena Price Gains Bearish Momentum; Here‚Äôs Why On-chain data from Arkham Intelligence on March 22 signaled that market maker Amber Group deposited $10.35 million worth of ENA to Binance. Out of the deposits, $2.5 million worth of tokens were acquired from the same crypto exchange two weeks ago. This accumulation took place at an average price of $0.3979. On the other hand, Amber Group received $7.85 million worth of coins from the Ethena Claim address. These tokens were received between April 2024 and July 2024. For context, the market maker‚Äôs massive dump to Binance impacts a crypto‚Äôs supply dynamics. In turn, market participants expect short-term volatility in price. However, speculations of a bolstered movement also prevail as this endeavor will increase liquidity and trading volumes, thereby magnetizing investors. Ethena Token Unlocks: Another Vital Barrier For Price? Simultaneously, ENA tokenomics faces additional heat amid massive token unlocks recorded this month. Notably, Cryptorank‚Äôs data flagged 2.06 billion coins, worth 13.9% of the total supply, unlocked on March 5. Meanwhile, 94.19 million coins, worth 0.63% of the asset‚Äôs total supply, were unlocked on March 2. These unlocks substantially increase the asset‚Äôs market supply, negatively impacting demand and price sentiments. Another massive unlock of 94.19 million coins is set to occur on April 2. Further, 171.85 million tokens will be unlocked on April 5. As a result, traders and investors reflect highly concerning sentiments surrounding Ethena price action ahead as the supply inflates. How Is The Crypto Delivering As The Month Ends? At the time of reporting, Ethena price crashed nearly 4% and exchanged hands at $0.3581. The coin bottomed and peaked at $0.3497 and $0.3763 in the past 24 hours. Notably, the waning price action comes in sync with Amber Group‚Äôs massive dump to the top crypto exchange . Whereas, the weekly and monthly charts show a dip of 1% and 11%, respectively. The broader slumping action falls in line with the massive token unlocks mentioned above. Renowned market trader and analyst Sjuul/AltCryptoGems took to X, revealing that ENA again faced crucial resistance at $0.48, slamming the chances for a pump ahead. ‚ÄúIf bulls fail to defend this demand, it would be a pretty bad sign,‚Äù the analyst concluded amid bearish dynamics taking over. Source: Sjuul/AltCryptoGems, X. Additionally, an Ethena price prediction by CoinGape indicated that the crypto‚Äôs 3-month bias indicator is tilting in favor of bears. This has further pushed traders and investors to take a cautious trading approach on the token. On the other hand, it‚Äôs also worth mentioning that Ethena Labs and Securitize unveiled plans to launch Converge, a blockchain tailor-made for DeFi and tokenized assets. Nevertheless, traders and investors expect diminished market interest in the asset due to broader dynamics. The post Is Ethena Price At Risk? Market Maker Offloads $10M ENA Raising Concerns appeared first on CoinGape .

var errorMessage = document.getElementById('error-message-select'); // Use a Set to handle unique data-ids var uniqueSubscribedIds = new Set(listOfSubscribed); checkboxes.forEach(function(checkbox) { var dataId = parseInt(checkbox.getAttribute('data-id')); if (checkbox.checked) { selectedSubscriptions.push(checkbox.id); storeCheckedId.push(dataId); } else { uniqueSubscribedIds.delete(dataId); // Remove unchecked data-id } }); // Update listOfSubscribed with unique values listOfSubscribed = Array.from(uniqueSubscribedIds); var selectedSubscriptionsString = selectedSubscriptions.join(', '); var concatinateSubscribeId = [...new Set(storeCheckedId.concat(listOfSubscribed))]; var categoryData = { 'subscribed_categories': concatinateSubscribeId }; var requestSubscriberData = { action: 'handle_dynamic_api_request_with_headers', security: '756ef7cc31', endpoint: '/app/email_newsletter/update_categories', token: '', data: categoryData }; jQuery.ajax({ url: 'https://coinpedia.org/wp-admin/admin-ajax.php', type: 'POST', data: requestSubscriberData, beforeSend: function(xhr) { xhr.setRequestHeader('X-Requested-With', 'XMLHttpRequest'); }, success: function(response) { try { response = response.data; if (storeCheckedId.length === 0) { var unsubcribedPopUpmodal = ` You‚Äôve Unsubscribed Successfully We're sorry to see you go! Your subscription has been canceled. If you change your mind, you can re-subscribe anytime. Thank you for being part of our community! `; unsubscribemodal.innerHTML = unsubcribedPopUpmodal; document.querySelector('#subscribe-modal-design .modal').style.display = 'none'; unsubscribemodal.style.display = 'block'; unsubscribemodal.classList.remove('hide'); unsubscribemodal.classList.add('show'); document.getElementById('subscribe_' + categoryid).style.display = 'block'; document.getElementById('unsubscribe_' + categoryid).style.display = 'none'; var showDownloadReport = document.getElementById('download_report'); if (showDownloadReport) { showDownloadReport.style.display = 'none'; } } else { var subscribedPopupModal = ` Thank you for subscribing! Thank you for subscribing to our crypto and blockchain newsletter! You‚Äôll now receive the latest news, insights, and updates straight to your inbox. Welcome to our community! `; let selectedSubscriptionsArray = selectedSubscriptionsString.split(','); let subscribedCategories = selectedSubscriptionsArray.map(subscription => subscription.split('_')[0]); let subscribedCategoriesString = subscribedCategories.join(', '); subscribedmodal.innerHTML = subscribedPopupModal; if (document.getElementById('selectidname')) { document.getElementById('selectidname').textContent = subscribedCategoriesString; } document.querySelector('#subscribe-modal-design .modal').style.display = 'none'; subscribedmodal.style.display = 'block'; subscribedmodal.classList.remove('hide'); subscribedmodal.classList.add('show'); document.getElementById('subscribe_' + categoryid).style.display = 'none'; document.getElementById('unsubscribe_' + categoryid).style.display = 'block'; var showDownloadReport = document.getElementById('download_report'); if (showDownloadReport) { showDownloadReport.style.display = 'block'; } } } catch (e) { console.error('Error parsing response:', e); } }, }); } function closeModal(template_id) { var modalId = template_id; var modal = document.querySelector('#' + modalId); // Using querySelector to find the modal if (modal) { modal.classList.add('hide'); modal.classList.remove('show'); setTimeout(function() { modal.style.display = 'none'; }, 500); } else { console.warn('Modal not found:', modalId); } } function closeunsubscribemodal() { var unsubscribemodal = document.querySelector('.unsubscribed-popup-modal .modal'); if (unsubscribemodal) { unsubscribemodal.classList.add('hide'); unsubscribemodal.classList.remove('show'); } setTimeout(function() { unsubscribemodal.style.display = 'none'; }, 500); } function closesubscribemodal() { var subscribedmodal = document.querySelector('.subscribed-popup-modal .modal'); setTimeout(function() { subscribedmodal.style.display = 'none'; }, 500); if (subscribedmodal) { subscribedmodal.classList.add('hide'); subscribedmodal.classList.remove('show'); } } function withoutLoginClicked(withoutlogin_id) { localStorage.setItem('subscribe_without_Login', 'true'); localStorage.setItem('subscribe_clicked_id', withoutlogin_id); } document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', function() { const subscribewithoutData = localStorage.getItem('subscribe_without_Login'); const subscribe_clicked_cat_id = localStorage.getItem('subscribe_clicked_id'); // Function to get cookies function getCookie(name) { let value = "; " + document.cookie; let parts = value.split("; " + name + "="); if (parts.length == 2) return parts.pop().split(";").shift(); } // Get user token from cookies const userToken = getCookie('user_token'); if (subscribewithoutData === 'true' && userToken) { // Call the modal function with the category ID subscribed_popupmodal(subscribe_clicked_cat_id); // Remove the flag and category ID from localStorage localStorage.removeItem('subscribe_without_Login'); localStorage.removeItem('subscribe_clicked_id'); } }); /************************** update susbcriber content **************************** */ function initializeSubscriptionButton() { var initialListItems = document.querySelectorAll('.subscription-options input[type="checkbox"]'); initialListItems.forEach(function(item) { console.log(item.checked, 'Initial Checkbox checked status'); }); var listItems = document.querySelectorAll('.subscription-options li'); if (listItems.length === 0) return; var anyActive = false; listItems.forEach(function(item) { var checkbox = item.querySelector('input[type="checkbox"]'); if (checkbox) { if (checkbox.checked) { item.classList.add('active'); anyActive = true; // Set anyActive to true } else { item.classList.remove('active'); // Remove 'active' class if checkbox is unchecked } } }); } function updateButtonText(anyActive) { var subscribeButtonSpan = document.querySelector('.subscribe-submit .changeBtnText'); if (subscribeButtonSpan) { if (anyActive) { subscribeButtonSpan.textContent = 'Subscribe Now'; } else { subscribeButtonSpan.textContent = 'Unsubscribe'; } } } function updateSubscriptionButton() { var listItems = document.querySelectorAll('.subscription-options li'); if (listItems.length === 0) return; var anyActive = false; listItems.forEach(function(item) { var checkbox = item.querySelector('input[type="checkbox"]'); if (checkbox) { if (checkbox.checked) { item.classList.add('active'); anyActive = true; // Set anyActive to true } else { item.classList.remove('active'); // Remove 'active' class if checkbox is unchecked } } }); // Update the button text based on whether any list item has the 'active' class updateButtonText(anyActive); } document.addEventListener('click', function(event) { var clickedItem = event.target.closest('.subscription-options li'); if (clickedItem) { var checkbox = clickedItem.querySelector('input[type="checkbox"]'); if (checkbox) { checkbox.checked = !checkbox.checked; updateSubscriptionButton(); } } }); FAQs Bitcoin price prediction for 2025? Analysts predict a 62% chance of BTC hitting $110K and a 48% chance of reaching $120K in 2025, based on market trends and investor sentiment. What will Bitcoin be in 10 years? Projecting a 10-year growth in a volatile asset like Bitcoin seems a far-stretched notion. The BTC price is expected to cross $600,000 by 2030. With global adoption, Bitcoin could be worth 1 million dollars .

title: Ripple Urges SEC to End Crypto Confusion With Clearer Regulations
body: Ripple, a leading blockchain payments firm, has submitted its formal response to the U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC), urging the agency to eliminate regulatory ambiguity in the crypto sector. This comes after SEC Commissioner Hester Peirce recently called for public input under the initiative titled ‚ÄúThere must be some way out of here,‚Äù aimed ‚Ä¶ Continue reading "Ripple Urges SEC to End Crypto Confusion With Clearer Regulations" The post Ripple Urges SEC to End Crypto Confusion With Clearer Regulations appeared first on Cryptoknowmics-Crypto News and Media Platform .
